thread.title: Claudio Ranieri thinks Kasper Schmeichel is one of the best goalkeepers in the world and is happy China can’t swoop for him
thread.title_full: Claudio Ranieri thinks Kasper Schmeichel is one of the best goalkeepers in the world and is happy China can’t swoop for him

author: sunsportonline
title: Claudio Ranieri thinks Kasper Schmeichel is one of the best goalkeepers in the world and is happy China can’t swoop for him
text:
EFL friendly boast Claudio Ranieri thinks Kasper Schmeichel is one of the best goalkeepers in the world and is happy China can’t swoop for him 
The Foxes manager is ecstatic that China are forbidden to sign foreign goalkeepers, and believes the Danish shot-stopper is getting better with each game by justin allen
